title: input
name: input
description:
Used inside cfform to place radio buttons, checkboxes, or text boxes. Provides input
  validation for the specified control type.

attributes.name: autosuggest
attributes.description:
Specifies entry completion suggestions to
                    display as the user types into a text input. The
                    user can select a suggestion to complete the text
                    entry.
                    The valid value can be either of the following:
                    - A string consisting of the suggestion values
                    separated by the delimiter specified by the
                    delimiter attribute.
                    - A bind expression that gets the suggestion
                    values based on the current input text.
                    Valid only for cfinput type="text".

attributes.name: autosuggestBindDelay
attributes.description:
The minimum time between autosuggest bind
                    expression invocations, in seconds. Use this
                    attribute to limit the number of requests that are
                    sent to the server when a user types.
                    Valid only for cfinput type="text"

attributes.name: autosuggestMinLength
attributes.description:
The minimum number of characters required in
                    the text box before invoking a bind expression to
                    return items for suggestion.
                    Valid only for cfinput type="text".

attributes.name: delimiter
attributes.description: The delimiter to use to separate entries in a static autosuggest list. This attribute is meaningful only if the autosuggest attribute is a string of delimited values.

attributes.name: maxResultsDisplayed
attributes.description:
The maximum number suggestions to display in the autosuggest list.
Valid only for cfinput type="text".

attributes.name: onBindError
attributes.description: The name of a JavaScript function to execute if evaluating a bind expression, including an autosuggest bind expression, results in an error. The function must take two attributes: an HTTP status code and a message.

attributes.name: showAutosuggestLoadingIcon
attributes.description: A Boolean value that specifies whether to display an animated icon when loading an autosuggest value for a text input.

attributes.name: sourceForTooltip
attributes.description:
The URL of a page to display as a tool tip. The page can include HTML markup to control the format, and the tip can include images.
If you specify this attribute, an animated icon appears with the text "Loading..." while the tip is being loaded.

attributes.name: typeahead
attributes.description:
A Boolean value that specifies whether the autosuggest feature should automatically complete a user's entry with the first result in the suggestion list.
Valid only for cfinput type="text".

attributes.name: validateAt
attributes.description:
How to do the validation; one or more of the following:
            onSubmit, onServer or onBlur.
            onBlur and onSubmit are identical in Flash forms. For
            multiple values, use a comma-delimited list.
            Default: onSubmit

attributes.name: type
attributes.description:
The input control type to create:
            - button: push button.
            - checkbox: check box.
            - file: file selector; not supported in Flash.
            - hidden: invisible control.
            - image: clickable button with an image.
            - password: password entry control; hides input values.
            - radio: radio button.
            - reset: form reset button.
            - submit: form submission button.
            - text: text entry box.
            - datefield: Flash only; date entry field with an
              expanding calendar for selecting dates.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: A name for the form input element.

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: An initial value for the form input element.

attributes.name: required
attributes.description: Enter Yes or No. Default is No.

attributes.name: range
attributes.description: Enter a minimum and maximum value range, separated by a comma. Valid only for numeric data.

attributes.name: validate
attributes.description:
date: verifies format mm/dd/yy.
            eurodate: verifies date format dd/mm/yyyy.
            time: verifies time format hh:mm:ss.
            float: verifies floating point format.
            integer: verifies integer format.
            telephone: verifies telephone format ###-###-####. The
                separator can be a blank. Area code and exchange must
                begin with digit 1 - 9.
            zipcode: verifies, in U.S. formats only, 5- or 9-digit
                format #####-####. The separator can be a blank.
            creditcard: strips blanks and dashes; verifies number using
                mod10 algorithm. Number must have 13-16 digits.
            social_security_number: verifies format ###-##-####. The
                separator can be a blank.
            regular_expression: matches input against pattern
                attribute.

attributes.name: bind
attributes.description:
A Flash bind expression that populates the field with
            information from other form fields.

attributes.name: bindAttribute
attributes.description:
Specifies the HTML tag attribute whose value is
                    set by the bind attribute. You can only specify
                    attributes in the browser's HTML DOM tree, not
                    Lucee-specific attributes.
                    Ignored if there is no bind attribute.
                    Valid only for cfinput type="text".

attributes.name: bindOnLoad
attributes.description:
A Boolean value that specifies whether to
                        execute the bind attribute expression when first
                        loading the form.
                        Ignored if there is no bind attribute.
                        Valid only for cfinput type="text".

attributes.name: border
attributes.description: passed through to input tag created, only used for type html.

attributes.name: accept
attributes.description: passed through to input tag created, only used for type html.

attributes.name: accesskey
attributes.description: passed through to input tag created, only used for type html.

attributes.name: align
attributes.description: passed through to input tag created, only used for type html.

attributes.name: alt
attributes.description: passed through to input tag created, only used for type html.

attributes.name: checked
attributes.description:
Selects a control. No value is required. Applies if
            type=radio or checkbox.
            Default: false

attributes.name: daynames
attributes.description:
A comma-delimited list that sets the names of the
            weekdays displayed in the calendar. Sunday is the
            first day and the rest of the weekday names follow in
            the normal order.
            Default is: S,M,T,W,Th,F,S

attributes.name: firstDayOfWeek
attributes.description:
Integer in the range 0-6 specifying the first day of the
            week in the calendar, 0 indicates Sunday, 6 indicates Saturday.
            Default is: 0

attributes.name: monthNames
attributes.description:
A comma-delimited list of the month names that are
            displayed at the top of the calendar.

attributes.name: height
attributes.description:
Applies to most Flash types, HTML image type on
            some browsers. The height of the control, in pixels. The
            displayed height might be less than the specified size.

attributes.name: width
attributes.description:
Applies to most Flash types, HTML image type on
            some browsers. The width of the control, in pixels. For
            Flash forms, Lucee ignores this attribute if you also
            specify a size attribute value.

attributes.name: hspace
attributes.description: passed through to form tag created, only used for type html.

attributes.name: label
attributes.description:
Label to put next to the control on a Flash or XML form.
            Not used for button, hidden, image, reset, or submit types.

attributes.name: mask
attributes.description:
A mask pattern that controls the character pattern that
            users can enter, or that the form sends to Lucee.
            In HTML and Flash for type=text use:
             - A = [A-Za-z]
             - X = [A-Za-z0-9]
             - 9 = [0-9]
             - ? = Any character
             - all other = the literal character
            In Flash for type=datefield use:
             - D = day; can use 0-2 mask characters.
             - M = month; can use 0-4 mask characters.
             - Y = year; can use 0, 2, or 4 characters.
             - E = day in week; can use 0-4 characters.

attributes.name: notab
attributes.description: passed through to form tag created, only used for type html.

attributes.name: datafld
attributes.description: passed through to form tag created, only used for type html.

attributes.name: datasrc
attributes.description: passed through to form tag created, only used for type html.

attributes.name: dataformatas
attributes.description: passed through to form tag created, only used for type html.

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description:
Disables user input, making the control read-only. To
            disable input, specify disabled without an attribute or
            disabled="true". To enable input, omit the attribute
            or specify disabled="false".

attributes.name: ismap
attributes.description: passed through to form tag created, only used for type html.

attributes.name: readonly
attributes.description: passed through to form tag created, only used for type html.

attributes.name: src
attributes.description:
Applies to Flash button, reset, submit, and image types,
            and the HTML image type. URL of an image to use on
            the button. Flash does not support GIF images.

attributes.name: usemap
attributes.description: passed through to form tag created, only used for type html.

attributes.name: title
attributes.description: passed through to form tag created, only used for type html.

attributes.name: dir
attributes.description: passed through to form tag created, only used for type html.

attributes.name: lang
attributes.description: passed through to form tag created, only used for type html.

attributes.name: onValidate
attributes.description:
The name of a JavaScript function used to validate user input. The form object, input object,
	and input object value are passed to the specified routine, which should return true if validation
	succeeds and false otherwise. If used, the validate attribute is ignored.

attributes.name: pattern
attributes.description:
The JavaScript regular expression pattern to use to validate the input. Required only if you
	specify validate = "regular_expression".

attributes.name: message
attributes.description: Message text to appear if validation fails.

attributes.name: onError
attributes.description: The name of a JavaScript function you want to execute in the event of a failed validation.

attributes.name: size
attributes.description: The size of the input control. Ignored if type is Radio or Checkbox.

attributes.name: maxLength
attributes.description: The maximum length of text entered, if n type is Text.

attributes.name: passThrough
attributes.description:
HTML attributes that are not explicitly supported by cfinput.
				If you specify an attribute and value,
				they are passed to the HTML code generated for the cfinput tag.

attributes.name: class
attributes.description: passed through to form tag created, only used for type html.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: passed through to form tag created, only used for type html.

attributes.name: onBlur
attributes.description: passed through to form tag created, only used for type html.

attributes.name: onChange
attributes.description: passed through to form tag created, only used for type html.

attributes.name: onClick
attributes.description: passed through to form tag created, only used for type html.

attributes.name: onDblclick
attributes.description: passed through to form tag created, only used for type html.

attributes.name: onFocus
attributes.description: passed through to form tag created, only used for type html.

attributes.name: onKeyDown
attributes.description: passed through to form tag created, only used for type html.

attributes.name: onKeyPress
attributes.description: passed through to form tag created, only used for type html.

attributes.name: onKeyUp
attributes.description: passed through to form tag created, only used for type html.

attributes.name: onMouseDown
attributes.description: passed through to form tag created, only used for type html.

attributes.name: onMouseMove
attributes.description: passed through to form tag created, only used for type html.

attributes.name: onselect
attributes.description: passed through to form tag created, only used for type html.

attributes.name: onMouseUp
attributes.description: passed through to form tag created, only used for type html.

attributes.name: onMouseOut
attributes.description: passed through to form tag created, only used for type html.

attributes.name: onMouseOver
attributes.description: passed through to form tag created, only used for type html.

attributes.name: style
attributes.description: passed through to form tag created, only used for type html.

attributes.name: tabIndex
attributes.description: passed through to form tag created, only used for type html.

attributes.name: enabled
attributes.description:
Flash only: Boolean value specifying whether the control is
            enabled. A disabled control appears in light gray. The
            inverse of the disabled attribute. Flash only.
            Default: true

attributes.name: visible
attributes.description:
Flash only: Boolean value specifying whether to show the
            control. Space that would be occupied by an invisible
            control is blank.
            Default: true

attributes.name: tooltip
attributes.description:
Flash only: Text to display when the mouse pointer hovers
            over the control.

attributes.name: autocomplete
attributes.description: HTML attribute: Specifies the types of files that can be submitted through a file upload (only for type="file")

attributes.name: autofocus
attributes.description: Specifies that the input field should have focus on page load (not for type="hidden")

attributes.name: form
attributes.description: HTML attribute: Specifies one ore more forms the input field belongs to

attributes.name: formaction
attributes.description: HTML attribute: Overrides the form's action attribute. Must be a valid URL that defines where to send the data when the form is submitted (for type="submit" and type="image")

attributes.name: formenctype
attributes.description: HTML attribute: Overrides the form's enctype attribute. Specifies how form-data should be encoded before sending it to the server (for type="submit" and type="image")

attributes.name: formmethod
attributes.description: HTML attribute: Overrides the form's method attribute. Defines the HTTP method for sending data to the action URL (for type="submit" and type="image")

attributes.name: formnovalidate
attributes.description: HTML attribute: Overrides the form's novalidate attribute. If present the input field should not be validated when submitted

attributes.name: formtarget
attributes.description: HTML attribute: Overrides the form's target attribute. Specifies the target window used when the form is submitted (for type="submit" and type="image")

attributes.name: list
attributes.description: HTML attribute: Refers to a datalist containing predefined options for the input field

attributes.name: max
attributes.description: HTML attribute: Specifies the input field's maximum value. Use together with the "min" attribute to create a range of legal values

attributes.name: min
attributes.description: HTML attribute: Specifies the input field's minimum value. Use together with the "max" attribute to create a range of legal values

attributes.name: multiple
attributes.description: HTML attribute: If present the user is allowed more than one value

attributes.name: placeholder
attributes.description: HTML attribute: Specifies a hint to help users fill out the input field

attributes.name: step
attributes.description: HTML attribute: Specifies the legal number intervals for the input field
